name: Bullet Hell Versus
description:
Note: Game is best played with 16:9 screen

Goal: PVP, winner gets all! Go to the middle green trigger to spawn randomly distributed bullets around you. You can use your body to bounce your own bullets into the other player. When you get a hit, you get some bullets spawned again. Look out for power bullets!

Controls:

  • P1 - Left shift to release bullets, WASD to move.
  • P2 - Right shift to release bullets, arrow keys to move.
